message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a truly unique item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. This is a great deal, considering the product's value to me is at least $800000. I think you'll find it's well worth the investment.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. However, my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $850000 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After considering your offer, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $875000. This is a fair price, considering the product's value to me is at least $800000. I think you'll find it's a great deal.
